North India Packages.name: Golden Triangle Tour
North India Packages.description: Explore the iconic cities of Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur, featuring world-famous landmarks like the Taj Mahal and Amber Fort.

North India Packages.name: Shimla and Manali Getaway
North India Packages.description: Enjoy the serene beauty of the Himalayas with visits to Shimla and Manali. Perfect for nature and adventure lovers.

North India Packages.name: Varanasi Spiritual Retreat
North India Packages.description: Immerse yourself in the spiritual vibes of Varanasi with a visit to the Ganga Ghats and Kashi Vishwanath Temple.

North India Packages.name: Rajasthan Heritage Tour
North India Packages.description: Discover the royal palaces, forts, and desert landscapes of Rajasthan, including Jodhpur, Udaipur, and Jaisalmer.

North India Packages.name: Leh-Ladakh Adventure
North India Packages.description: Embark on a thrilling journey to Leh-Ladakh with stunning landscapes, monasteries, and adventure activities.

East India Tour Packages.name: Discover Darjeeling & Gangtok
East India Tour Packages.description: Explore the scenic beauty of Darjeeling and Gangtok, the cultural charm of monasteries, and breathtaking Himalayan views.

East India Tour Packages.name: Mesmerizing Meghalaya
East India Tour Packages.description: Discover the magical landscapes of Meghalaya, including lush valleys, waterfalls, and unique living root bridges.

East India Tour Packages.name: Odisha Heritage & Chilika Lake
East India Tour Packages.description: Dive into Odisha's rich heritage with visits to ancient temples and the serene beauty of Chilika Lake.

East India Tour Packages.name: Majestic Arunachal Pradesh
East India Tour Packages.description: Experience the untouched beauty of Arunachal Pradesh, its monasteries, snow-capped mountains, and vibrant tribal culture.

Educational Tour Packages.name: Delhi Historical Monuments Tour
Educational Tour Packages.description: A fascinating educational tour of Delhi's historical landmarks such as the Red Fort, Qutub Minar, and India Gate.

Educational Tour Packages.name: Science City and Planetarium Visit, Kolkata
Educational Tour Packages.description: Explore the wonders of science at the Kolkata Science City and learn about astronomy at the Birla Planetarium.

Educational Tour Packages.name: Jaipur and Agra Cultural Heritage Tour
Educational Tour Packages.description: Discover the architectural marvels of Jaipur and Agra, including the Taj Mahal, Amber Fort, and Hawa Mahal.

Educational Tour Packages.name: Hyderabad's Birla Science Museum and Ramoji Film City
Educational Tour Packages.description: An educational journey to the Birla Science Museum and the world-famous Ramoji Film City in Hyderabad.

Educational Tour Packages.name: Bengaluru ISRO and Visvesvaraya Museum Tour
Educational Tour Packages.description: Visit ISRO's Space Research Center and the Visvesvaraya Industrial and Technological Museum in Bengaluru.

Family Tour Packages.name: Goa Family Vacation
Family Tour Packages.description: A fun-filled family holiday exploring the beautiful beaches of Goa, including water sports, shopping, and cultural experiences.

Family Tour Packages.name: Kerala Backwaters Family Tour
Family Tour Packages.description: Experience the tranquil beauty of Kerala's backwaters on a houseboat cruise, along with visits to tea plantations and beaches.

Family Tour Packages.name: Rajasthan Family Heritage Tour
Family Tour Packages.description: A royal family tour across Rajasthan, visiting palaces, forts, and desert cities like Jaipur, Udaipur, and Jodhpur.

Family Tour Packages.name: Andaman Family Escape
Family Tour Packages.description: A relaxing family tour to the pristine beaches and coral reefs of Andaman and Nicobar Islands with water activities and sightseeing.

Family Tour Packages.name: Shimla and Manali Family Getaway
Family Tour Packages.description: A perfect family vacation in the picturesque hill stations of Shimla and Manali with snow-capped mountains and local markets.

highlights: Visit the Mysore Palace and Brindavan Gardens.
Scenic train ride through the Nilgiri Hills to Ooty.
Explore local markets and temples in Bangalore.
Stay in a houseboat on Alleppey’s backwaters.
Tea plantations and waterfalls in Munnar.
Sightseeing in Cochin, including Fort Kochi.
